org.jretty.util

类 ResourceUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jretty.util.ResourceUtils

  • public class ResourceUtils
extends Object
    资源文件工具类
    从以下版本开始:
    2013-6-07
    作者:
    zollty

      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      static String CLASSPATH_ALL_URL_PREFIX
      Pseudo URL prefix for all matching resources from the class path: "classpath*:" This differs from ResourceLoader's classpath URL prefix in that it retrieves all matching resources for a given name (e.g.
      static String CLASSPATH_URL_PREFIX
      Pseudo URL prefix for loading from the class path: "classpath:"
      static String CONTEXTPATH_URL_PREFIX
      Pseudo URL prefix for loading from the ServletContext relative file path, e.g.
      static String LOCAL_FILE_URL_PREFIX
      Pseudo URL prefix for loading from local file system file path, e.g. file:C:/test.dat

    • 字段详细资料

      • CONTEXTPATH_URL_PREFIX

        public static final String CONTEXTPATH_URL_PREFIX
        Pseudo URL prefix for loading from the ServletContext relative file path, e.g. "contextpath:WEB-INF/test.dat",
        另请参阅:
        org.zollty.util.resource.web.ServletContextResource, javax.servlet.ServletContext, 常量字段值

      • LOCAL_FILE_URL_PREFIX

        public static final String LOCAL_FILE_URL_PREFIX
        Pseudo URL prefix for loading from local file system file path, e.g. file:C:/test.dat
        另请参阅:
        org.zollty.util.resource.FileSystemResource, File, 常量字段值

      • CLASSPATH_URL_PREFIX

        public static final String CLASSPATH_URL_PREFIX
        Pseudo URL prefix for loading from the class path: "classpath:"
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • CLASSPATH_ALL_URL_PREFIX

        public static final String CLASSPATH_ALL_URL_PREFIX
        Pseudo URL prefix for all matching resources from the class path: "classpath*:" This differs from ResourceLoader's classpath URL prefix in that it retrieves all matching resources for a given name (e.g. "/beans.xml"), for example in the root of all deployed JAR files.
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • getInputStreamFromJar

        public static InputStream getInputStreamFromJar(Class<?> jarClazz,
                                                String resourcePath)
                                         throws NestedCheckedException
        取得class所在 jar包 中的资源 {注意jar必须在文件目录下，不能在war或ear包中}
        参数:
        jarClazz -
        resourcePath - 资源文件的相对路径（比如 FS_RQ.xsd，比如 com/zollty/config/FS_RQ.xsd）
        返回:
        the InputStream (may be null)
        抛出:
        NestedCheckedException

      • getInputStreamFromClassPath

        public static InputStream getInputStreamFromClassPath(ClassLoader classLoader,
                                                      String resourcePath)
                                               throws NestedCheckedException
        取得clazz.getClassLoader()所在 ClassPath下的资源（非url.openStream()模式，支持动态更新）
        参数:
        classLoader -
        resourcePath - 相对路径
        抛出:
        NestedCheckedException

      • getResourceFromJar

        public static URL getResourceFromJar(Class<?> jarClazz,
                                     String resourcePath)
                              throws NestedCheckedException
        取得class所在 jar包 中的资源
        参数:
        jarClazz -
        resourcePath - 相对路径
        返回:
        Resource's URL (null if the resourcePath is not found)
        抛出:
        NestedCheckedException

      • getProperties

        public static Properties getProperties(InputStream in)
        通过输入流获取Properties实例
